youtube.title: How NPWT Works: Negative Pressure Wound Therapy Explained
youtube.description: Discover the fascinating science behind Negative Pressure Wound Therapy (NPWT). This medical procedure uses controlled suction to accelerate healing in complex wounds. Perfect for biology students and healthcare pros looking to see medical technology in action!
